question: I received a msg on my phone 2 days ago. "BLESSINGS OF ALLAH-ALLAHUMA MAGHFIRATUKA AWSA'OO MIN ZUNOOBI WA RAHMATUKA ARHAABIINDI MIN AMALEE send this msg to 7 pple.U will receive a miracle tmorrow"
answer:
QUESTION
As-Salaam-u-Alaikum. The message is exactly as follows: "BLESSINGS OF ALLAH- ALLAHUMA MAGHFIRA- TUKA AW'SA'OO MIN ZUNOOBI WA RAHMATUKA ARHAABI INDI MIN AMALEE. send this message to 7 people.U will receive a miracle tomorrow" Please comment on it. What does it mean? Is it true? etc. Jazakallahu-khair
ANSWER


Share:
There is no basis in Shari'ah in sending the Du'aa to seven people and
receiving a miracle.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
